text: Howard Lloyd Weitzman (September 21, 1939 - April 7, 2021) was an American entertainment lawyer. He was known for representing Michael Jackson's estate in the IRS case against him. Other famous clients include Justin Bieber, O.J. Simpson and John DeLorean. Weitzman was a founding partner at Kinsella Weitzman Iser Kump & Aldisert (KWIKA). He was born in Los Angeles. Weitzman died on April 7, 2021 in Los Angeles from cancer, aged 81. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Lawyers from Los Angeles Category:Businesspeople from Los Angeles Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles
